meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing alkali.
meanings.sent1: The soap was alkalic, making it effective at cleaning grease.
meanings.sent2: The alkalic solution turned the litmus paper blue.
meanings.sent3: The alkalic detergent bubbled with excitement as it tackled the dirty dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and alkalic as a freshly cleaned window.
meanings.sent5: The alkalic taste of the medicine lingered on his tongue long after he swallowed it.
